title: Talks Machina: Discussing C2E9 - Steam and Conversation
description: After Critical Role each week, everyone needs to take a second to breathe and process. Talks Machina brings Critical Role cast members together with host Brian Wayne Foster to chat about the latest happenings on the hit show, answer audience questions, and more.
content:encoded: After Critical Role each week, everyone needs to take a second to breathe and process. Talks Machina brings Critical Role cast members together with host Brian Wayne Foster to chat about the latest happenings on the hit show, answer audience questions, and more.
